fields.Title: KINEEMA ORB / halogen watermarks
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.watermark_stand_in_front"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.read_the_watermark_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()
fields.Description: the dialogue where-in you've turned on the lights of the kineema and you can look at the halogen watermarks stuff on your ledger
fields.Placement: in front of the kineema on the plaza floor AND if possible also village (if kineema is there)

fields.Title: START
input
Rhetoric: "*Alpha male officers who are proud..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Alpha male officers who are proud of their numbers* often do -- it's meant.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "The next is the longest. It runs al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The next is the longest. It runs all the way around the border and then some.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you really think I have any ide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you really think I have any idea?"

fields.Title: You: ""Two-hundred sixteen, to be exact.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Two-hundred sixteen, to be exact."

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm a killer...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm a killer..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [watermarkhub]
Jump to: [watermarkhub]
You: ""Those are my confirmed kills. Thre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those are my confirmed kills. Three of them."

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "The rectangular watermark is overla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rectangular watermark is overlaid with the logo of the RCM, and yet the major arteries of Revachol are all recognizable. They shimmer in the Kineema's headlights.

fields.Title: Jump to: [watermarkhub]
You: ""I will make it okay with the power..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I will make it okay with the power of rock and roll."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Personally, I find it helps to kee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Personally, I find it helps to keep up a few hobbies."

fields.Title: Jump to: [lastcophub]
Damaged Ledger: "It seems as though you don't have a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It seems as though you don't have anything to pour out. Too bad for the boys.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It's meant in earnest. Please don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's meant in earnest. Please don't mistake it for a jab.

fields.Title: You: "Tally up the different rows."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tally up the different rows.

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "You can now see your statistics on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can now see your statistics on your JOURNAL page -- to the right of the task description.

fields.Title: Half Light: "That's right. A killer of humans."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right. A killer of humans.

fields.Title: Half Light: "He's sincerely glad you're not a sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's sincerely glad you're not a scary predator. Not to say relieved you're competent.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the shimmering street grid."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the shimmering street grid.

fields.Title: You: "What about the last row?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What about the last row?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The first row represents your year..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The first row represents your years of service. *Eighteen* years? Okay -- not bad at all. What did you do before you volunteered?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cool. I'm glad you joined us. Not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool. I'm glad you joined us. Not a lot of money in doomcrying... Let's move on, shall we?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Doesn't that tingle in your index f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't that tingle in your index finger give it away?

fields.Title: You: "Must be a muscle spasm."
fields.Dialogue Text: Must be a muscle spasm.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, Martinaise at night," he smell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, Martinaise at night," he smells the air and says.

fields.Title: Jump to: [lastcophub]
Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very noble of you. Are we done her..."]
CheckItem("drug_alcohol_goracy_brew")
CheckItem("drug_alcohol_goracy_brew")
!(CheckItem("drug_alcohol_goracy_brew"))
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yes. Coal City, Le Royaume, the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yes. Coal City, Le Royaume, the Burnt Out Quarter..."

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "Not bad for what? You don't even kn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not bad for what? You don't even know what it means yet.

fields.Title: Variable["tc.turn_off_tutorial_node"]
Variable["tc.turn_off_tutorial_node"]
!(Variable["tc.turn_off_tutorial_node"])
Damaged Ledger: "That's it."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it.

fields.Title: You: ""I would have thought there'd be mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would have thought there'd be more."

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "Right. The meaning of the perforati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Right. The meaning of the perforations remains opaque to you.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "You catch a faint glimmer from a br..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You catch a faint glimmer from a broken beer bottle. In the distance -- sounds. Two men engaged in a drunken argument, followed by the closing of some distant window.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But it seems as though you are, or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it seems as though you are, or at least *were*, one of the good ones. So we have that to be thankful for."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very noble of you. Are we done her..."]
Damaged Ledger: "A dark pool of cheap pilsner appear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A dark pool of cheap pilsner appears at your feet. It shimmers in the lights of the Kineema.

fields.Title: IsNighttime()
IsNighttime()
!(IsNighttime())
Damaged Ledger: "There are so many it's hard to coun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are so many it's hard to count. More than 150, at least. Maybe even 200.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This next row -- the one that wrap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This next row -- the one that wraps all the way around -- is your number of closed cases. *Closed* is good. It means finished. You've got, let's see..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right. Those are your confirmed ki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. Those are your confirmed kills. You've got precisely *three* perforations there."

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks for this." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks for this." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: You: "Seems like something I've done befo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems like something I've done before.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You know the answer already. The ti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know the answer already. The tingle in your index finger gave it away.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right here," he says, his finger n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right here," he says, his finger near the top of the map, on a segment of coast jutting out into the great ocean.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very noble of you. Are we done her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very noble of you. Are we done here?"

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe I should find a hobby?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe I should find a hobby?"

fields.Title: CheckItem("jacket_carabineer")  or  CheckItem("pants_carabineer")
CheckItem("jacket_carabineer")  or  CheckItem("pants_carabineer")
!(CheckItem("jacket_carabineer")  or  CheckItem("pants_carabineer"))
CheckItem("drug_alcohol_potent_pilsner")
CheckItem("drug_alcohol_potent_pilsner")
!(CheckItem("drug_alcohol_potent_pilsner"))
You: ""I'm sure I've seen worse.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure I've seen worse."

fields.Title: Shivers: "All of them worse than here."
fields.Dialogue Text: All of them worse than here.

fields.Title: Jump to: [lastcophub]
You: ""Wait, *eighteen years* I've done t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, *eighteen years* I've done this?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, Martinaise," he smells the air..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, Martinaise," he smells the air and says.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe you were a diplomat? Or in P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe you were a diplomat? Or in PR? Doesn't matter, I suppose... Let's move on, shall we?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "And something you'll do again, befo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And something you'll do again, before this is all over.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "A dark pool of cheap wine appears a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A dark pool of cheap wine appears at your feet. It shimmers in the lights of the Kineema.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not gardening? You've already..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not gardening? You've already got the yellow gloves..."
fields.Alternate1: "Why not gardening? You've already got the gloves..." He points to your yellow gardening gloves.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "A dark pool of pale-aged vodka appe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A dark pool of pale-aged vodka appears at your feet. It shimmers in the lights of the Kineema.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "Around the borders of the watermark..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Around the borders of the watermark are dozens, no, *hundreds* of micro-perforations.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, that *does* seem quite likely..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, that *does* seem quite likely. Your youth coincided with some heady days for Revachol. But let's move on, shall we?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, right. Sometimes the brain's a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, right. Sometimes the brain's able to preserve certain responses even when conscious memory has been... let's say... *misplaced*..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For an RCM officer -- especially P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For an RCM officer -- especially Precinct 41, which is in the Jamrock Quarter -- it's rather... tame. I mean that in a good way."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There are certain officers who tre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are certain officers who treat their kills like some kind of ghoulish game. If they do happen to *solve* a case it's usually by accident." It's obvious the lieutenant doesn't think very highly of these officers...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you want to pour out the booze..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you want to pour out the booze you've been carrying around *on duty*, I'm certainly not going to stop you..."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Honourably done. You have given up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Honourably done. You have given up some of your own blood -- for theirs.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry for killing you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry for killing you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods with evident re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods with evident respect. "It's quite a lot, even for someone who's been on the force for nearly two decades. Usually clearing more than 10 cases a year puts you in the 90th percentile of *all* RCM officers..."

fields.Title: Shivers: "In the middle of a broken plaza, il..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the middle of a broken plaza, illuminated in a cone of light, two men, one slim, the other sturdy. They are on the city stage, but only one of them knows his lines...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not really sure what you're su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not really sure what you're supposed to say at these things."

fields.Title: You: ""Like what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like what?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right. I'll go turn off the lights..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. I'll go turn off the lights..." He presses a remote control on the key.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "A rat brazenly darts past you and d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A rat brazenly darts past you and disappears amongst the stopped lorries. In the distance -- a child somewhere shrieks, a woman reprimands her in a voice no quieter than the child's cry...

fields.Title: Interfacing: "As you hold your ledger's clip unde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you hold your ledger's clip under the headlamp, a shimmering iridescent pattern appears. One you've definitely seen before...
fields.Sequence: TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, TequilaHeadlightsLoc); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimHeadlightsLoc);

fields.Title: You: "Look at the perforations."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the perforations.

fields.Title: CheckItem("hat_revolutionary")
CheckItem("hat_revolutionary")
!(CheckItem("hat_revolutionary"))
Interfacing: "As you hold your ledger's clip unde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you hold your ledger's clip under the headlamp, an iridescent hologram appears: a street grid and the veins of a great river. A familiar sensation washes over you...
fields.Sequence: TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, TequilaHeadlightsLoc); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimHeadlightsLoc);

fields.Title: You: "What about the next one?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What about the next one?

fields.Title: You: ""I was expecting a higher number, h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was expecting a higher number, honestly."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I'm just gonna hold onto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I'm just gonna hold onto this."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not historical reenactment? Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not historical reenactment? You've already got that turn of the century revolutionary hat..."
fields.Alternate1: "Why not historical reenactment? You've already got that turn of the century revolutionary hat..." He points to your hat.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anything's better than annihilatin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anything's better than annihilating yourself with drugs and alcohol..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [watermarkhub]
watermarkhub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know, the RCM is a volunteer's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, the RCM is a volunteer's organization. We would have no qualms with vagrants joining our ranks were they qualified... but let's move on, shall we?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think I can ever *re-becom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think I can ever *re-become* this person... What's the last number?"

fields.Title: You: ""Is now a good time to pour one out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is now a good time to pour one out for the fallen?"

fields.Title: You: "Wait... look around you."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait... look around you.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You count 216 perforations. Conside..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You count 216 perforations. Considering that nice, large number, a wave of pride washes over you, though you can't say why, precisely.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not historical reenactment? Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not historical reenactment? You've already got that antique carabineer gear..."
fields.Alternate1: "Why not historical reenactment? You've already got that antique carabineer gear..." He points to your carabineer swag.

fields.Title: You: ""I know you've killed some people i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know you've killed some people in the line of duty..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Those are *perforations*. They rep..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those are *perforations*. They represent your record as an officer of the RCM. They're your statistics, as it were. I should have guessed you'd keep a record, officers often do. Let's take a look..."

fields.Title: You: ""Got drunk like a megastar?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got drunk like a megastar?"

fields.Title: You: ""So you're saying I used to be a *s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're saying I used to be a *supercop*?"
fields.Alternate1: "See, Kim? I *told* you I was a superstar cop!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right," the lieutenant says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right," the lieutenant says, gauging your reaction. "How did you know?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""What's it feel like to kill a man,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's it feel like to kill a man, Mr. McCoy?" a young woman asks the man across the desk from her...

fields.Title: lastcophub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, this and that. Let's not get i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, this and that. Let's not get into it now."

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "A dark pool of moonshine-spiked bor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A dark pool of moonshine-spiked borscht appears at your feet. The chunks of beet shimmer in the lights of the Kineema.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "*Confirmed kills*? That sounds pret..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Confirmed kills*? That sounds pretty evil. A *drink* would soften that feeling.

fields.Title: You: "Not bad."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not bad.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fair point... Let's move on, shall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fair point... Let's move on, shall we?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's *quite* a lot, even for someo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's *quite* a lot, even for someone who's been on the force for nearly two decades. Usually clearing more than 10 cases a year puts you in the 90th percentile of *all* RCM officers..."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "As you look at them you feel your i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you look at them you feel your index finger reflexively contract three times.

fields.Title: You: ""Because I felt a twitch in my inde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I felt a twitch in my index finger."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's what it says. I might've gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what it says. I might've guessed even longer based on your age... what did you do all those blissful years of your youth?"

fields.Title: Logic: "It's not unlike the pattern from th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not unlike the pattern from the racist lorryman's boots. A stylized map of Revachol.

fields.Title: You: ""Is that a lot?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that a lot?"

fields.Title: You: ""Have you ever killed anyone, Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you ever killed anyone, Kim?"

fields.Title: You: "(Let's look at something else.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Let's look at something else.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not take up a sport? You've al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not take up a sport? You've already got that FALN gear..."
fields.Condition1: CheckEquipped("jacket_faln")  or  CheckEquipped("pants_faln")  or  CheckEquipped("shoes_faln")  or  CheckEquipped("shirt_faln")
fields.Alternate1: "Why not take up a sport? You've already got that FALN gear..." He gestures toward your performance gear.

fields.Title: CheckItem("gloves_garden")
CheckItem("gloves_garden")
!(CheckItem("gloves_garden"))
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No -- it does *not*," the lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- it does *not*," the lieutenant says without optimism.

fields.Title: You: ""Here's to you, honoured dead.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here's to you, honoured dead."

Physical Instrument: "Son, here is where we score your li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Son, here is where we score your life performance. You better hope it's good.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's not a problem for him to state..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not a problem for him to state it, however.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither am I. Are we done here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither am I. Are we done here?"

fields.Title: You: ""I used to be good. That's some sol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I used to be good. That's some solace I guess. What's the last number?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Call it what you want. You were a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Call it what you want. You were a valuable member of your precinct. Now, let's look at the last row..."

fields.Title: You: ""How do you handle the strain?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you handle the strain?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," he says, declining to elabor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," he says, declining to elaborate.

fields.Title: You: "(Pour one out on the ground -- cere..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Pour one out on the ground -- ceremonially.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Suit yourself...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Suit yourself..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There she is: Revachol West." Ther..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There she is: Revachol West." There's a note of pride in the lieutenant's voice.

fields.Title: You: "Three, that's it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Three, that's it?

fields.Title: You: ""I walked the land telling whores a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I walked the land telling whores and liars of the End to come. There are 9,855 days remaining."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wow, more than 200!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wow, more than 200!"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A memory, an echo in the recesses o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A memory, an echo in the recesses of your amygdala.

Variable["inventory.ledger_handeye_reflex"]
!(Variable["inventory.ledger_handeye_reflex"])
You: ""Where are we on this?" (Point to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where are we on this?" (Point to the halogen map.)

fields.Title: You: "Count them individually."
fields.Dialogue Text: Count them individually.

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.ledger_esprit_kill_a_man"]
Variable["inventory.ledger_esprit_kill_a_man"]
!(Variable["inventory.ledger_esprit_kill_a_man"])
You: ""Seems nice.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seems nice."

fields.Title: You: ""Seems like a shithole.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seems like a shithole."

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "There are many of them. And they ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are many of them. And they are divided into three separate rows.

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "The first row has 18 dots."
fields.Dialogue Text: The first row has 18 dots.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, Kim, what do all these holes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, Kim, what do all these holes mean?" (Point to the dots on the watermark.)

fields.Title: You: ""I was a hobo and I lived under a b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was a hobo and I lived under a boat."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No shame in working a regular job,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No shame in working a regular job, detective. Sometimes after a long day of doing *this*, I even envy it... Let's move on, shall we?"

fields.Title: You: ""That's not... too many.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not... too many."

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.ledger_handeye_reflex"]
Variable["inventory.ledger_handeye_reflex"]
!(Variable["inventory.ledger_handeye_reflex"])
You: ""Because I feel like a killer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I feel like a killer."

fields.Title: You: ""Just a lucky guess.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just a lucky guess."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let me see." He takes the ledger f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me see." He takes the ledger for a moment and inspects it.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe I should pour one out for th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe I should pour one out for the boys? The fallen?"
fields.Alternate1: "Are you *sure* I shouldn't pour one out for those fallen boys?"

fields.Title: You: ""Hobbies are lame.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hobbies are lame."

fields.Title: Shivers: "In the middle of a broken plaza, in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the middle of a broken plaza, in a cone of light barely visible in the daytime, two men, one slim, the other sturdy. They are on the city stage, but only one of them knows his lines...

fields.Title: Variable["jam.racist_boots_pattern"]  and  Variable["doomed.mapwall_main_hub_reached"] == false
Variable["jam.racist_boots_pattern"]  and  Variable["doomed.mapwall_main_hub_reached"] == false
!(Variable["jam.racist_boots_pattern"]  and  Variable["doomed.mapwall_main_hub_reached"] == false)
You: ""Okay, let's go." [Put the ledger a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, let's go." [Put the ledger away.]

fields.Title: Damaged Ledger: "The last row has three perforations..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The last row has three perforations.

fields.Title: You: ""Probably a some boring office job...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably a some boring office job. Same as everyone else."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Definitely not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Definitely not."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As you will...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "As you will..."

fields.Title: You: ""The Gloaming comes for all, but it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Gloaming comes for all, but it came first for you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It has its problems...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It has its problems..."

fields.Title: Variable["tc.map_of_revachol"]
Variable["tc.map_of_revachol"]
!(Variable["tc.map_of_revachol"])
You: ""I feel like I just went around apo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I feel like I just went around apologizing all the time."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everyone has their own method of c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone has their own method of coping, some more effective, or self-destructive, than others..." He gives you a meaningful look.

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.ledger_perception_perforation_count"]
Variable["inventory.ledger_perception_perforation_count"]
!(Variable["inventory.ledger_perception_perforation_count"])
Esprit de Corps: ""Honestly, babe," says John McCoy,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, babe," says John McCoy, crossing his ankles over said desk, "I don't feel anything anymore. It's just like brushing my teeth -- I do it once or twice a week and don't really think about it." There's no trace of guilt in his voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant sighs.
